WHERE b.bbs_blind='N' AND b.pet_idx in (SELECT p.pet_idx FROM pet p WHERE p.dog_cat='dog')ORDER BY b.bbs_idx ASC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs_img(newFileName, oriFileName, bbs_idx) VALUES(#{param1},#{param2},#{param3})
mapper.select: SELECT bbs_idx, bbs_subject, bbs_content, nickName,reco_count FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY reco_count DESC) AS rnum,bbs_idx, bbs_subject, bbs_content, nickName,reco_count FROM bbs WHERE type !='gal') WHERE rnum between 1 and 5

SELECT bbs_idx, newFileName, oriFileName FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY b.reco_count DESC) AS rnum, bi.bbs_idx, bi.newFileName, bi.oriFileName FROM bbs_img bi, bbs b WHERE b.bbs_idx = bi.bbs_idx AND b.type= 'gal') WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 3
